goal: Implementing a comprehensive alarm clock application that displays both analogic and digital clocks with alarm setting features.
description: The task requires developing an application using specific technologies: TypeScript, Electron, and SQLite.

steps.goal: Set up the project structure and dependencies
steps.description: Create a basic file structure for the application and install required dependencies like React and Electron.
Create folders for source code, assets, and node modules to organize the project structure.
Use npm or yarn to install React and Electron required for the application development.
Use HTML5 canvas to draw an analogic clock. Handle mouse events for drag functionality if needed.
Decide on the dimensions and design of the clock face, including positions for hours, minutes, and seconds hands.
Use HTML5 canvas methods to draw the analogic clock's hour, minute, and second hands. Ensure proper sizing and positionning relative to the center of the clock face.

steps.goal: Implement drag functionality for clock hands
steps.description: Add event listeners for mouse events (mousedown, mousemove, mouseup) to allow user interaction with the clock hands. Update hand positions based on mouse movement.
Create a digital display component using React, updating it in real-time with current time data from JavaScript Date API.
Ensure all necessary tools such as Node.js, npm, and a code editor are installed.
Use create-react-app to initialize the project and set up a new component for the digital clock.
Fetch the current time using the JavaScript Date API and format it appropriately for display.

steps.goal: Display Digital Clock in React Component
steps.description: Render the formatted time data within a JSX element to create the digital clock display.
Use setInterval function or other methods to continuously fetch and update the displayed time in real-time.
Integrate a user interface to set alarms via date and time inputs. Store alarm settings in SQLite database for persistence.
Design the layout for setting alarms, including input fields for date and time.
Implement functionality to accept user inputs for alarm date and time.

steps.goal: Store Alarm Settings in SQLite Database
steps.description: Develop the logic to persist alarm settings in a SQLite database.
Implement a notification system that emits alerts when an alarm is triggered, utilizing Electron's notification APIs or other suitable libraries.
Decide which library to use for notifications, such as Electron's notification API or alternatives like Toastify or Notifier.
Define the logic that triggers alerts when an alarm is set and activated within the application.
Implement integration between the chosen library and the alarm clock feature to ensure seamless alert emission upon trigger time.
Ensure all components are integrated seamlessly. Test the application for functionality, including alarms triggering correctly.
Implement integration of analogic clock component with the rest of the alarm clock app.
Implement integration of digital clock component with the rest of the alarm clock app.
Develop and integrate the feature to set alarms, including user input for time and repetition options.
Verify that the analogic clock displays correctly and functions properly within the app.
Verify that the digital clock displays correctly and functions properly within the app.
Ensure alarms trigger on schedule, notify user, and provide options for snoozing or dismissing.
